transArray.content: Good service and clean room. Opposite Metro Line 6

Hello dear guest! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and taking your precious time to share your stay experience with us. It is our honor to have a clean and comfortable stay. The hotel is located in the Badili Automobile Park on the West Fourth Ring Road, 5 km from Haidian Metro Line 6. It only takes a five-minute walk from Luju Station. Public transportation is accessible in all directions and travel is convenient. Thank you for your support and recognition of our service attitude and hygiene. This makes all the staff of Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel confident on the road ahead. We look forward to working with you. Every time you meet! I wish you all the best! Manager: Ren Yuanyuan
